name: National Oilwell Varco, Inc.
description: National Oilwell Varco, Inc. (NOV) is a leading provider of equipment and technology for the oil and gas industry. Founded in 1862 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, NOV designs, manufactures, and sells a wide range of products and services that support drilling, completion, and production operations. The company operates across multiple segments, including Rig Technologies, Wellbore Technologies, and Completion & Production Solutions. NOV is particularly renowned for its innovative drilling rigs and associated equipment, which are used worldwide by major oil and gas operators. The company’s mission is to enhance the safety and efficiency of oil and gas operations while reducing overall environmental impact through advanced technologies and engineering solutions. In recent years, NOV has also engaged in initiatives aimed at diversifying its offerings to include renewable energy technologies, reflecting a broader industry shift towards sustainability. As one of the largest suppliers to the oil and gas sector, NOV plays a crucial role in shaping the future of energy by driving technological advancements and promoting best practices in the industry.
